name: Dark Flat Minimal Firefox [oh:boy]
description: Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Do you see a slender plastic tag clipped to this style with my name printed on it? Do you see a little Asian child with a blank expression on his face sitting outside on a mechanical helicopter that shakes when you put quarters in it? No? Well, that's what you see at a toy store.
additional_info:
Time to get things done seriously: vimperator ready, updated colors, even more sexy and complete!

This is the enhanced updated version with some more killer options like show close buttons on tabs, show menu, show forward button, hide url bar and more. meh, just try it yourself. Still dark, still minimal, still flat. You won't regret!

Since i can't figure out my password and login mail anymore i created a new account and this style instead. If you want the real experience, try this one!

This is the enhanced version of the previous Dark Flat Minimal Firefox - Theme (https://userstyles.org/styles/122751/dark-flat-minimal-firefox), which i uploaded 7 months ago.

Turn the options on and off within the top section of the CSS! :)

Check out the great about:home userstyle as seen on my screenshot: "Material Firefox About:home" (https://userstyles.org/styles/127973/material-firefox-about-home) by RushArt

discussions.name: it just messes up with everything on the top toolbar back, button everything
